website_summaries.verdict: Although inexpensive, this ESH-validated model works well for most users and comes with notable features.
pros: Earns approval by the European Society of Hypertension
Has an irregular heart beat indicator
cons: Some inaccuracies reported, but most users are happy with its performance

customer_reviews.title: Blood pressure meter
customer_reviews.text: Fast and efficient service very easy to use indicator on left side denotes high low blood pressure with simple red and green indicators if you don't understand the figures.
customer_reviews.author: hawkwind

customer_reviews.title: Absolute rubbish
customer_reviews.text: It gives completely random results every time. Delivered today and each time its been used, to test, it's given numbers plucked from thin-air. We're not talking about the odd number here or there, it's all over the place. Whether you're in fine fettle or about to keel over, you will have no idea. Could be my last review ... I love you, mum.
customer_reviews.author: Mr JRW

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item due to my blood pressure dropping dramatically and that was causing me to pass out unexpectedly. When I first used this product it came back with a reading saying that my blood pressure was borderline high which I knew was not accurate. The blood pressure readings jumps from one number to another within seconds and the images that I have uploaded show the blood pressure monitor giving a reading which is too high and I would of been dead if my blood pressure was actually that high. Do not buy this product, especially if you need accurate readings for your health. I am in the process of a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Russell

customer_reviews.title: What appeared to be a very good product at a vastly reduced price worked excellently five ...
customer_reviews.text: What appeared to be a very good product at a vastly reduced price worked excellently five times. The sixth time the diastolic and pulse readings disappeared. All efforts to troubleshoot failed, including putting in new batteries and carrying out instructions to restart. You are advised to contact the manufacturer. The Amazon purchase order does not provide the link to do this as with other products. A non returnable sale item presumably. The risk of false economy.
customer_reviews.author: E R TRIANCE

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I need for a daily measure or my blood pressure. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: tumja01

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item that you can easily use with no compilation, the sleive fits perfectly and is adjustable. Also comes with batteries supplied so all in all this is really good and very accurate in its reading.
customer_reviews.author: Chris g.

customer_reviews.title: NO CONTACT DETAILS FOR SELLER IF THERE ARE ANY PROBLEMS
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived at the beginning of January 2019 and worked well until February 2019, so about 1 month. It then started malfunctioning and I could smell something burning! I was willing to have a replacement or a full refund, however I was very hard pressed to find the seller's contact details to report to, so with this in mind, be warned.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.W. UK

customer_reviews.title: Great Blood Pressure Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great Blood Pressure monitor and a great price. Bought this as I need to keep tabs on my BP. Really pleased
customer_reviews.author: Budge

customer_reviews.title: Fine if you want random results
customer_reviews.text: Fine if you want random results. You can take a reading, then another and have wildly different readings. Avoid, buy one that works instead.
customer_reviews.author: Not you

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, spend a bit more money
customer_reviews.text: This little device was so inaccurate that we found it hysterically funny, we took turns to see who could get the highest reading - my husband’s BP is usually around 120/75 or thereabouts, but with this BP monitor he managed 220/120. I took his BP with the old fashioned cuff and stethoscope method just to make sure he wasn’t in fact having a heart attack, tough though it was to hear the systolic beat when everyone in the room was laughing like hyenas
customer_reviews.author: Neutralion

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend as it work well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for parents to keep track of their health. Works well and they seemed pleased if not a little surprised at the gift :)
customer_reviews.author: EdgyBeer

customer_reviews.title: Great accurate machine
customer_reviews.text: Being of a certain age where things like blood pressure are starting to matter more I decided to take my BP on a regular basis. I had one of those cheap wrist machine which gave differing readings which is next to useless. This was on offer so bought it with free shipping using my trial Prime membership. I calibrated it with the professional machine I use in my work place, a nursing home, and it was spot on. It's very easy to use, keeps a record of recent readings and the batteries last a good time. All in all a very good device.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Needs  a second pair of hands to wrap cuff
customer_reviews.text: Smart looking with clear digital figures. The user instructions were in such tiny print that I had to enlarge them on a printer. I followedevery word of information about fitting the cuff but decided that it needed a second person to wrap it correctly. The white spot on the cuff, which indicates the position where it should lie on the arm, was marked on the inside of the cuff so that it could not be seen once the wrap around was secure. The adult cuff for my size arm seemed too big but the device is stated in the instructions to be unsuitable for a smaller cuff. I am returning it all.
customer_reviews.author: Ianthe

customer_reviews.title: Bought older parent
customer_reviews.text: Finds this very easy to use and accurate. Found like a few others the cuff supplied which was standard large was not quite big enough for our needs. It does state this clearly in the description. Bought an additional extra large cuff which was sent out very quickly it is more suited to the arm size... overall very pleased, just a shame the device cannot be bought with different sizes cuff, instead of having to buy a further cuff in addition which cost the same as the original purchase That being said it's a good product reasonably priced. Measure your arm befor you buy to make sure the cuff will fit is my only advice!
customer_reviews.author: Miss S Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Just like at the GP
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same device my own GP uses and it works simple with no need to know any medical information. The best thing about the device is the bar along side the digital screen which goes from green-yellow-red which clearly indicates if your BP is good or hight. Its great to keep track of your own health without needing to bother the GP too frequently and it means as soon as you see a change you can book an appointment as a preventative measure.
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Got on advice of doctor to let me check my pressure at home when not stressed by being at the doctors. It does drink batteries (4xAA) when used regularly as you would expect but does have a nice clear battery level indicator so you can put them on charge if you use some rechargeables. Clear instructions, clear readings on nice big screen, has 30 slot memory it can scroll through if needed such as if you need to note down your readings for doc. Single big button to start process so easy to use and seems solid enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace old monitor I gave away to a friend. Good price and it does the job needed. Arm band is a good size and is adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Erika duke

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable, DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep an eye on my blood pressure, for the first couple of months I only used it a couple of times but my gp has taken my blood pressure and given me extra medication to bring it down, I've been using this a lot over the last couple of weeks with various readings today it read over 170 sys and as low as 117 sys,not reliable so I will look at getting a different make after I contact the seller, unfortunately its now 4 months old and I'm not able to send back, DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: STEVE FULLER

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate readings. I used it three times in a row and the three meassurements were absolutely different. I tried it on my husband and the same thing happended. Not trustworthy!
customer_reviews.author: Lara R M

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware -- No after sales service... or concern
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a while then the numbers were all over the place, Local surgery compared their OMRON model with our inconsistent A & D Medical UA-611 and suggested I buy a different make but I chose to contact the UK distributor. They offered two options.1. Have it re-calibrated for £38 or 2. buy another one. So much for after-sales care. I am reminded of the saying 'buy cheap, buy twice'
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over 18months ago and initially it worked fine. However, it hadn’t been used for several months and when switched on came up the batteries were flat. So, New batteries. Same result. As you can use it via the mains I tried that. Now it doesn’t work at all. Tried contacting the company with no joy. It’s a solid piece of kit and it should have lasted longer especially as it has only been used a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Shapfell

customer_reviews.title: Buy the device without Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my older A and D device. The product itself is great, though expensive. The problem with the device is the app. Had so many issues it made sense to just return the device. The Bluetooth and the app were absolutely garbage. It wouldn't store users details only part of the info was ever available, total waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: NOT ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: All my 4 readings over 3 days gave me a systolic rate of 72 - 74. Five minutes before a proper nurse-done BP check at my GP surgery I took a reading - sys 73. The nurse got a systolic reading of 60. Straight out of the surgery - I had the unit in my car - I took another reading ans still got that figure of 73. So how is this useful? I am returning it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the business; had to buy a larger cuff
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on accuracy - readings seem reasonable but not checked by anyone else or any other machine. Easy enough to use; once cuff fastened on arm just press the button and wait for results to appear on screen. I record mine with pen and paper as I believe the machine only stores a month's worth. I did have to buy an extra large cuff separately, which annoyingly cost almost the same as the machine with its smaller cuff - my punishment for eating too much cake leading to fat arms!
customer_reviews.author: Latenighter

customer_reviews.title: A Little Confusing, But Useful
customer_reviews.text: Accuracy - I can't really comment on, because I have no other way of determining what my blood pressure is. However I've used it on multiple people in my family and the results reflect what I'd expect, so I believe it is somewhat accurate. Ease Of Use - Once you figure everything out, it's pretty simple. The instructions are a little confusing, and overwhelming, so I highlighted the most important bits for future use. Overall I find this helpful and would recommend. I would have liked it if there was more information about what the results mean. I have to go online each time to check if the result is good or not, but otherwise it's useful.
customer_reviews.author: E Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use: After one use with the instructions already know how to use it without them (but do, though, read them the first time as you need to do various things for accuracy like using a particular arm and aligning the white dot on the sleeve with a particular finger). Good purchase and decent value as will be using fairly regularly and came with the four batteries included which I had not anticipated (useful bonus). Easy to pack away again. Large numbers so v easy to read and note down etc.
customer_reviews.author: Segal

customer_reviews.title: I can keep an account on my pulse and blood pressure ..Very handy .
customer_reviews.text: The Dr told me to get one of these blood pressure monitors,I failed my medical at work..So I bought one to check my blood pressure during the day..Just to see if it was work related or not...We have now put it down that I had a infection/virus,which is under control now..I'm a first wider at work so sometimes I take the device to work with me and I use it there..it tells me if people are joking with me or not..it's very useful .My husband even users it..It's very handy to have..I'm so glad that I've got one ..Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Stears

customer_reviews.title: Utter muck
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? Firstly the readings caused me extreme anxiety as they were so high I considered calling 999. I got my husband to check his bp and his was very high too. His is always perfect. The cuff has badly bruised and caused long red Mark's on my arm. It's too small. I'm average built and the cuff is tiny. The cuff says s on it yet the measurements are for a medium that's written on it so 2 different measurements. Really didnt need this anxiety over a machine that's crap.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Faith-Jason

customer_reviews.title: As good as the GPs
customer_reviews.text: Great little device and if not the same, it is as good as the GPs. I have given it five stars for accuracy although I can't really confirm that but I have no reason to suspect that it isn't accurate and is listed on the NHS website regarding blood pressure. Easy to use, easy to read, thirty reading memory, all through the single start button.
customer_reviews.author: Martin C

customer_reviews.title: Well made but
customer_reviews.text: It looks very well made and very easy to use, would be better if there a memory built in. I been using this for couple months now , its been very good but the original battery supplied was Rubbish it didnt last 2 weeks. It has been reliable but recently it mis-behaving coming up with lots of error reading lately so not sure how long this will work for but I already purchase another brand to back myself up if it does fail me soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tag

customer_reviews.title: Saved me during lockdown !
customer_reviews.text: In the lockdown I was concerned my blood pressure was high once again after being taken off of medication. I was unsuccessful in being able to get my blood pressure taken to check...so sent for this machine. I was able to understand, use and monitor my blood pressure in order to ring the g.p. And get medication (which was urgently sent round to avoid g.p said a stroke!) thanks to my readings they listened !
customer_reviews.author: MRS K RADFORD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the excellent customer service and I'm pleased to ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the first blood pressure monitor I received didn't work, so I contacted A&D customer services immediately and they decided that a replacement would be sent out. Very happy with the excellent customer service and I'm pleased to say that the replacement machine works very well.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Seems accurate and consistent
customer_reviews.text: First ever reading was a little high, but I had just walked up stairs and had to deal with a situation that for me is fairly stressful. I took 3 more readings afterwards that were all more consistent and in line with what I expected from the medication I am on. The arm pad doesn't pump up quite as strongly as the one at the pharmacy, but I think as long as you wrap it around nice and tight it isn't a problem. I actually prefer that it doesn't cut off the circulation in my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Latham

customer_reviews.title: It saves 30 readings bit doesn’t have date or time taken so not much benefit
customer_reviews.text: It saves 30 readings bit doesn’t have date or time taken so not much benefit, my old monitor displayed date and times of every reading, also not possible to scroll through the readings, it displays for 2-3 seconds then moves to the next one.....be handy to be able to step through the readings. Not completely sure it’s accurate, seems to be reading high Vs hospital readings.
customer_reviews.author: Reddwaf4ever enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: Seems easy enough to read and use, however.... make sure you get a band that fits. This band was small and would only fit a child or a very slim person of which neither my husband or I are. We ended up having to go buy the Large band for another £17 - should have just bought another unit that came with an adult sized band to begin with. I can't rate accuracy as it gave wild numbers I assume because we had a band that was way too small and couldn't get a good reading.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Awful product! INACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: Awful product! Completely inaccurate. I’m heavily pregnant and bought this so I can monitor my blood pressure at home as I’m being seen as often due to Covid. Done three readings all from the same arm, one high, one normal and one low reading. Left it half an hour and gave it another chance and again a massively high reading and then a low one? Absolute waste of money and wish I never bought it!! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca white

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep an eye on Mum's blood pressure and give her reassurance that she is ok. I know what my own blood pressure sits at and this is an accurate device in my opinion. It only comes with one cuff but fortunately it fits Mum despite her having tiny arms. Very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Cannot complain for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during a time of some heart worries which turned out to be just a scare and something else... The readings were pretty accurate in general when compared to the same day hospital readings at the time... However be prepared for the occasional (should go to the hospital Mr blood fountain!) if not put on totally right. Just re position and take another squeeze if the reading seems off and all should be well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Accurate & simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Really like this machine our old one had decided to give up so we purchased this one, A&D are a good medically used brand that was our main persuasion for buying this one and I'm glad we did this is the only machine that I've used that doesn't hurt my arm when taking readings and it is accurate in comparison to doctor readings. Nice lightweight especially if you want to take it on a trip away and simple to use what's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie

customer_reviews.title: A decent accurate blood pressure monitor
customer_reviews.text: Been diagnosed with high blood pressure - not sure if it’s permanent or temporary as I’m quite young. Gives accurate readings with only a marginal difference between two tests. I like the irregular heart rate function which I’ve triggered a few times but no-ones heart beats perfectly - I’d only be worried if it kept going off. Overall a decent blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Doctors orders
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read , i gave it one star because I’m as dumb as a bag of rocks and I’m not a doctor or nurse , i was told to get one and just write down the numbers ( remember rocks) apart from that I wasn’t expecting it to be as strong as the one that was used at the hospital i attended , it gave me that uncomfortable feeling i get when blood pressure gets taken , that’s my personal experience
customer_reviews.author: skitty65

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work reliably
customer_reviews.text: How do you know whether a blood pressure monitor is giving the right reading?! I assume that at time of purchase, the calibration is accurate. Having said that, this is really well constructed - it oozes quality and does the job consistently and quickly without any fuss. It is fraction of the price of the one which I was replacing (which has some fancy usb/two user feature but we never really used that). The little gauge indicating the BP zones is a super touch as it saves having to look up the reading on the graph each time.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The unit just feels solid - quality! I haven't had a chance to test the accuracy - next doctors visit I will. The memory function is a bit naff - the unit doesn't show date and time do it's a bit redundant. I track my readings on an app so it really wasn't worth paying for a more expensive one. This is all you need!
customer_reviews.author: lfcchard

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good
customer_reviews.text: GP asked me to monitor my blood pressure for a week, and to save the hassle of getting one through the NHS bought this. Instructions come on the biggest sheet of paper you've ever seen in your life, which I didn't bother reading. Plugged in the air hose, put it round my arm, pressed go, and bingo! Blood pressure readings straight away. Good item for the price, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hampson

customer_reviews.title: Useful kit
customer_reviews.text: After a few hospital admissions I decided to buy a blood pressure monitor for home use. I thought this would be very expensive so was delighted to find this one at an affordable price. It does everything that it's supposed to do with clear readings. If I was to improve it I'd give it the option to connect to the mains to preserve battery life, but if not having this option keeps the price low then I'd happily use rechargeable batteries instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tetlow

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily testing
customer_reviews.text: I needed to check my blood pressure daily due too fears of it being high. Easy to use, instructions in the box on how to tell what the numbers mean and how to retrieve previous results. Overall really handy and good for me to keep a track of my blood pressure without frequent visits to the doctors
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Ok on the very rare occasion it works!
customer_reviews.text: If you ever need an inflatable tourniquet this is ideal! Cuts off the circulation in your arm till your fingers tingle, then just when you start to get the feeling back, it inflates again! The only reason I've given it 2 stars is that when it actually works it seems quite accurate. I've tried adjusting the band looser and tighter but almost every time it comes up as an error.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Machine - Compact and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This device is fantastic. It is self-inflating and is really accurate. We compared it to the readings provided by the machine our doctor's surgery provided and the difference in readings were minimal. An excellent device if you need to regularly monitor blood pressure. Compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: A Gelder

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy because I thought it couldn't be any good for £15. Then I saw the thousands of positive reviews and went for it. In a nutshell, it's almost identical to the one my GP uses and works accurately. Instructions are clear, the arm band gets tight enough but does not exert excessive pressure and it gives a fast and precise reading. This is a great purchase, I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: gata

customer_reviews.title: A good unit well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A good unit.With all these types of unit they very in readings purely because ones blood pressure varies by the minute . Also tells you by coloured markings what level of blood pressure has been measured,ie low end of high,medium or very high. Pulse rate reeding also very good
customer_reviews.author: trafford

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: have been using it know over several weeks and its as accurate as you would expect it to be so its perfect I always test my blood pressure three times in a row and all the time and I have done so around 30 times and it has always given a consistent reading all the time so I would highly recommend this machine
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL A

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, a very poorly made product. Reading all over the place sent back same day
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, a very poorly made product. So inaccurate it beggar’s belief. Readings all over the place, thought I would have to call an ambulance at one point! Lucky it was the pressure monitor and not me. The arm band does not secure properly and is painful to use if you’re lucky enough to get it to stay on during use. I returned and bought another make that is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Artist

customer_reviews.title: Good/ strong machine
customer_reviews.text: I was recommend to get this by a friend whom has used it for quite a while. It feels strong and not like other light plastic feel. Definitely will last and normal use straight forward. Have been using wrist one and adviced to use this as more accurate reading. Best way to take reading is to sit up for 5 min and then take a reading
customer_reviews.author: Waheed Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great product, compatible with Samsung Health
customer_reviews.text: Successfully paired with my Samsung Note 4, using Samsung Health (Previously S Health). Readings are in line with what I've had taken at the doctors. I've successfully used this with rechargeable NiMh batteries as well, so no real ongoing costs if you have 4xAA NiMh and a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Davy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you have a bicep measurement over 32 cm! You need the large adult cuff
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't use it as my bicep measurement is 35 cm so the cuff won't fit. It wasn't clear when I made the purchase that there were different cuffs and not being a nurse or paramedic didn't know that this would be the case. One size doesn't fit all. Replacement cuff available but another £17 shelled out due to inaccurate product description.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H F G Devlin

customer_reviews.title: pumps up very strong
customer_reviews.text: never had a blood pressure meter before but thought I better keep an eye on it,not sure how accurate it is as I have nothing to compare it against, my only negative is when its pumping up to get your reading it puts so much pressure on your arm that it is actually painful! Not like this at the doctors !
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. G. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: At last, a electronic product that lives up to its promises! Well made, durable and fit for purpose. Battery life is surprisingly good. Easy operation and crystal clear readout are both to be roundly applauded. Have checked this BP device against calibrated clinical instruments and it is remarkably accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Remove the anxiety of the Surgery visit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly Mother who has always struggled with White Coat syndrome at the surgery. Now, monitoring her own Blood Pressure, she feels more at ease and it has taken away that added pressure when at the doctor's. So simple to use and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: For such a cheap unit it really is quite good. The cuff, tubing and monitor all feel as sturdy as you need it to be, considering this cost £12.00 at the time of writing. Checked with a manual bp cuff and stethoscope and it's as accurate as you need it to be at home.
customer_reviews.author: Fionn

customer_reviews.title: BLood Pressure Kit
customer_reviews.text: I need to keep tabs on my blood pressure and my GP told me the best way to have a home kit and check different times of the day. This is very easy to use but who really knows how accurate it truly is. I am writing down all the readings and kinda' taking an average over one day. But it is very easy to use and works very well. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Ammi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of kit. I sometimes work as ambulance crew and know it measures literally the same as kit costing a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: rob from essex

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth poor. No connection
customer_reviews.text: No different to the non-bluetooth option? Unable to access data on Apple or Android devices. 3 app options (only one matched the documentation). None worked for me. FAQ failed to connect, no user docs on website. A very poor product for connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: JD Pawson

customer_reviews.title: The best buy of my life, please read why
customer_reviews.text: The best buy of my life because thanks to this we might have avoided a big problem. We bought it because my boyfriend had headache for several days, we thought it could be high blood pressure so we decided to buy this one as it is recommended in the NHS website. Arrived next day and turns out that his blood pressure was super high so we went to the hospital. They measured the blood pressure and it was exactly the same as this monitor said. VERY IMPORTANT to keep an eye on this matter, so I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use.
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use and the cuff fits from a very small arm to an average adult - very wide range. Accuracy is always open to debate when devices are not certified each year by testing, but as a good guide of general trends that may keep you in correct contact with your health provider,it really is first class. Very simple to use, very clear display and great that it keep previous reading in memory.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hearnden

customer_reviews.title: not sure if it's accurate
customer_reviews.text: I'm not 100% if it's accurate. Does the job I guess, sometimes we have to do it 3 times back to back to see if it’s actually right. Also the cuffs were okay for me but I don’t have big arms, so if you are in the heavier side or have big biceps this cuffs will be too tight or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works well and simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: It came in helpful, for a person whom required to monitor her B/P daily as Blood pressure was very high, was commenced on anti hypertensive tablet. It Saved an NHS WORKER coming out during COVID. It helped and the Gp accepted the results and It showed the medication was working well for them.
customer_reviews.author: MBA

customer_reviews.title: Great Value seemed to do the job
customer_reviews.text: Can't test the accuracy as I've not another to test against but seemed easy to use and to read would of liked to of seen a case with it but was good value so can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davies

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I do like this, just like being in the doctors, but without the stress, so you`re more likely to get a real reading. Works just like the stuff you get at the doctors or hospital, so as a product goes ,,,It`s real and works well. I like it and trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: CUFF ERRORS AFTER A FEW MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: THE OMRON ONES ARE BETTER I THOUGHT THESE WOULD BE BETTER MADE IN JAPAN BUT NOT GOOD QUALITY I DON NOT RECOMMEND THIS ITEM WHY DID IT FAIL SO EARLY AND ITS NOT ALL IT IS ADVERTISED AS WASTE OF TIME
customer_reviews.author: Naser

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant bit of kit. I was concerned as this was relatively cheap in comparison to others on sale, however I need not of worried. It has been so helpful during the pandemic as I need to have my blood pressure taken regularly and as no one can go to their GP this has been invaluable.
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great! So handy to have at home. I'm currently undergoing cardiac related investigations and this has been crucial to capturing my bad/concerning moments. I also tested it out against another similar one and they both gave the same results. Feels good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great item, unfortunately was missing the mains plug from the box. Still works with batteries, but would prefer to have the mains option. Hope after my message to Amazon, they are going to send me the mains plug for it. The item itself is very good, I can highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: readings are different one after another
customer_reviews.text: i owuld not buy it again , when i go to my firnd to test my blood presure is a;lways around the same numbers, with this machine i can test blood presure and there is a huge diffrence betwenn 2 readings taken one after another
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my older reliable microlife monitor. This monitor is inferior and does not give reliable readings in my opinion compared with my old monitor (which I have reliably compared with my GP's monitor on several occasions). The readings given by this monitor are unreliably low . . .
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It works and is professional
customer_reviews.text: It's an approved item that was the reason to buy it. The second one being that modern doctors ask us nowadays if we've taken our blood pressure. Easy to apply and fully automatic and has full instructions supplied. I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: H. Nieuwenhuizen

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute piece of junk. I can take three consecutive readings, without moving and with relaxed breathing. First will show low blood pressure, 2nd will show normal and third will show high, all with greatly different heart beats. Nothing has changed. BUYER BEWARE DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: It will not work anymore - used once a day since buying 5 months ago and now it refuses to work properly - deflates all the time or gets to the top and then cuts out - annoyed doesn't even cover how I feel and there is no way of contacting the seller either DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Lear (MotorBikeTV)

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 6 month
customer_reviews.text: Six months after purchasing the product, the monitor automatically switches off two seconds after being turned on, without completing the reading. Tried with different batteries, tried to unplug and replug the blood pressure cuff. Nothing. Update: customer service team contacted few weeks ago: they never answered
customer_reviews.author: stefp

customer_reviews.title: It arrived well packed and very quickly. It worked ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packed and very quickly. It worked for a week and then refused to function. I hope it will be replaced and shall leave a further report.
customer_reviews.author: S Walker

customer_reviews.title: top rate value
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with this blood preasure monitor,I have just been put on blood preasure medication and advised to monitor myself,this monitor was highly reccomended and proved to be perfect,the delivery was eccecptional,the monitor is easy to use and very good value.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little blood pressure monitor from A&D The device is easy to use with the batteries included to get it up and running out of the box. The cuff is good quality with a great size range. The accuracy is good and comparable to other machines I have used. Reading the display is easy with it being a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable and professional Jap made monitor Easy to use quite simply does what it says on the tin. 5 memory readings. Easy to understand colour coded readings level meter to give an instant idea as to the meaning of the readings. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Bauhouse68

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get reliable readings to give to my doctor for monitoring my reaction to some new medication. I couldn't use the readings from this monitor because they were all over the place! Some were very high, others ridiculously low. I checked the machine on other family members and had the same outcome. Maybe we had a faulty machine, but I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: An ordinary mum

customer_reviews.title: Hurts
customer_reviews.text: It's good blood pressure reader however it really hurts my arm even when I put it on slack, I had to remove it from my arm as it feels as my arm will blow up lol. Please be careful if you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Always reading lower
customer_reviews.text: Took a reading before and after a GP appointment reading. My doctor said 120 over 80, this unit said 105 over 60 both times. It is so inaccurate as to be useless, or worse: misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Halo Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blood pressure monitor which is very simple to use. Very accurate. Bought for my Mum-in-Law who has has been advised to monitor her bp daily. Well worth the money as it has brought her great peace of mind. Excellent value. 5*
customer_reviews.author: Nicki 🤗

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's really simple and easy to use it. It doesn't have a smart function or an app that you can connect, but that's exactly what we were looking for . It is very straightforward to use and you can do it within seconds. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanos Malliaros

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, clear results screen.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use BP machine with cuff / batteries, having being told my BP was little high, I decided to buy machine mainly because of the "white coat" theory , it would help my anxiety next time it is done at GP's. am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the docters and it's a better reading because your relaxed in your own home with out all the rush to the docters . Take 3 readings and take the average .
customer_reviews.author: I. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this so far but only been using it a month. The cuff seems quite average size so make sure you measure your arm against cuff size before purchasing. Luckily have average smallish arms in our family 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Matey

customer_reviews.title: This device could literally save your life.
customer_reviews.text: I Had a feeling I had high blood pressure, so rather than pestering the doc to monitor it, I liked the idea of monitoring it myself on a consistent basis, found this device at a great price. It turns out I did have "Prehypertension", which is the stage before things become dangerous called "Hypertension", I have now taken the right steps and have been recording Normal Blood pressure recently after making small changes to diet and upping exercise. I truly believe this little gem stopped me slipping in to a dangerous state of Hypertension.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous item
customer_reviews.text: A really great, easy to use, accurate piece of kit! Very cheap and well made. Easy to follow instructions (even if the instructions sheet is a little large! The cuff fits well, sturdy and comfortable. Readings are quick and easy to understand. Amazing price for the quality of the device. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: jennie b

customer_reviews.title: What the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this gadget in lockdown as it was near impossible to have my blood pressure checked anywhere safely. It is very easy operate and very accurate. It displays both levels of your blood pressure and your pulse.
customer_reviews.author: Bookmarked Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely does the job
customer_reviews.text: Got this on advise of a doctor in order to take 2 readings a day for 7 days. Very easy to set up and use- just press one button and then read the results on screen! The results were quite similar each time I did readings so I think it is pretty accurate. Very good value for money!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy to use machine, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second monitor i've purchased in 10 years! Its much easier to read than tge last as it has green, yellow & red bars on left of machine so you dont have to know readings by the numbers - green is good, yellow is high end of normal so make appt with GP & red is VISIT GP ASAP!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Having had like another reviewer had to buy the bigger sleeve, the device works fine, i use it in the morning and in the evening. I take 3 readings and then take the average. As i have to take some tablets as i have border line blood pressure tablets it good to see that my blood pressure is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Strutt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, handy for keeping a check on blood pressure. Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: A. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Just take the values with a pinch of salt
customer_reviews.text: It’s the accuracy that puts me off with this one. Did 20 measurements in a row the disparity was bigger than 10%, way bigger. Got values from 123 up to 168 within 30 minutes of continuous testing, rather you use the manual one that I’ve.
customer_reviews.author: T R

customer_reviews.title: Low accuracy, not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using A&D blood pressure devices for about 17 years with very high accuracy, this time either the unit i bought is defected or A&D quality curve is going down, as it gave wrong readings (3 wrong readings out of 4). hope they fix this issue soon.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy to use blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Having never bought a blood pressure monitor before I thought it was time I did. After some research, I opted for an upper arm monitor as it seems to provide a more accurate reading. This is a very easy to use blood pressure monitor, with clear instructions. I had an accurate blood pressure reading within 2 minutes of opening the box. Batteries are included. Great value for money too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fielding

product_meta.title: AND Blood Pressure Monitor
product_meta.description:
The UA-611 utilizes the latest 3rd generation technology from A&D, with an easy one button operation incorporating the advantage of automatic fuzzy logic controlled inflation including the Irregular heart beat (IHB) feature.

The UA-611 is supplied with the Latex and metal free, SlimFit Cuff (22-32cm) giving the user a more comfortable experience.

An additional 31-45 cm SlimFit Large cuff option (Latex and metal free) can be ordered from the Amazon website.

The UA-611 is clinically validated to the world recognized European Hypertension Society (ESH) guidelines so the user can have confidence in their readings.

The average value feature of the stored data (up to 30 readings) along with the WHO Blood pressure classification indictor allows the user to better control their management program.

A&D have been a leading provider of medical devices for both home healthcare and healthcare professionals worldwide since 1979.

The quality of the UA-611 allows A&D to offer the user a 5 Year warranty (excluding batteries and Cuff).

The UA-611 provides the user a leading cost effective solution with the reassurance of advanced technology and ESH clinical validation

Box Contains

UA-611 Automatic Blood Pressure MonitorLatex and Metal Free, SlimFit Cuff (22-32 cm)Instruction Manual4 x AA Batteries
feature_bullets: One button control - with latest 3rd generation fully automatic measurement technology and SlimFit Cuff size from 22-32 cm
Irregular Heart Beat Indicator (IHB) - can be useful in the detection of atrial fibrillation
Clinically validated to the world recognised European Hypertension Society (ESH) 2010 protocol
World Health Organisation (WHO) blood pressure classification indicator - for easy and clear understanding of BP reading
Unique 5 year product warranty - for complete peace of mind

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
